CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up activity to MOT then leaves room
MOT moves some toys around on floor
CHI faces MOT with back to camera
MOT holds out squeaky toy to CHI
CHI reaches out to take toy from MOT
CHI continues to look at duck
MOT points to face on toy
<2> MOT looks at jack+in+the+box on floor
CHI kneels on floor in front of jack+in+the+box
CHI throws duck on the floor
CHI attempts to stuff clown in the box
MOT reaches to help CHI but withdraws her hand quickly
CHI stuffs clown in the box
MOT reaches out to touch jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches over and removes CHI hand from top of jack+in+the+box
CHI continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
MOT sits up straight and watches CHI
CHI stops playing with jack+in+the+box when handle seems stuck .
CHI looks at toy near jack+in+the+box
CHI turns attention to toy car on the rug next to him
<$=1> MOT begins to rise and move toward CHI
MOT begins to take off CHI sweater
MOT takes toy out of CHIs hand
CHI gets arm stuck in sweater
CHI rubs back of head after sweater comes off
MOT puts sweater in her bag
MOT moves over next to CHI on floor
CHI puts finger in a hole in the ball
MOT leans over CHI to look at ball
MOT crawls around CHI's front and inspects the football
CHI looks up into MOT face as she leans over him
MOT sits back on her knees
MOT brushes hand over the top of CHIs head
CHI reaches over for the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box until it pops out
CHI pushes clown down with one hand
MOT sits back on her knees
CHI reaches over to close top with other hand
CHI lets go of top then pulls out clown
MOT points to eyes on clown
CHI points to eye of clown
CHI holds onto head of clown
MOT reaches over and pushes the clown down along with CHI
CHI pushes clown in then lets it go
MOT reaches over to jack+in+the+box then closes top

CHI turns attention to another toy beside him
CHI spins wheels on toy car
CHI rolls car back and forth on rug
CHI holds car in front of him and plays with the wheels then puts the car on the rug and rolls it back and forth several times
CHI looks at the car . CHI turns to look at football
CHI picks up football and puts his finger into the hole . CHI plays with football
CHI puts fingers in holes of football then moves it around in the air
CHI attempts to throw ball but it is stuck on his finger
CHI pulls fingers out of holes then puts them back in again
CHI looks up at MOT then holds his hand out
MOT quickly moves her arm out from her lap and then back
CHI looks at football . CHI turns and looks at MOT
<$=/1> MOT opens palm of hand ready to receive ball while looking at CHI
CHI pulls finger out of ball and holds finger up

MOT refers to CHI pulling fingers out of holes

CHI turns from facing MOT to play with jack+in+the+box
MOT sits back to watch CHI

CHI moves hand off top of box
CHI stops turning crank then tries to open the lid with his fingers
CHI continues to try to open lid with his fingers
CHI turns crank then jack+in+the+box pops out

CHI points to face of clown
CHI continues to look at and point to clown's face
CHI pokes at face of clown with both hands
CHI pokes at eyes of clown
<bef> MOT moves closer to CHI on floor
CHI points at eyes of clown
CHI pokes at eyes of clown
CHI presses his thumb into clown's eye
CHI pushes the clown into box
CHI still tries to push clown down
CHI pulls clown out of box

CHI pokes eye a number of times . CHI holds the clown down inside the box
CHI pulls the clown out then stuffs it back in
CHI pushes the clown up and down
CHI stops playing with the clown then points to its face
CHI stuffs clown into box then lets it pop out
<2-6> MOT points at clown . <10> MOT points to top of box
CHI pokes clown eye with finger
CHI holds top of clowns head
MOT rolls football around in her hands

INV enters room . End of warm-up

INV explains four boxes to MOT then leaves room

MOT puts box upside down on the table with ball underneath the box

CHI watches as ball rolls out from underneath box

MOT taps ball so that it rolls toward CHI
CHI looks at something across the table
MOT sets the box on its side so that the open end faces CHI
CHI rolls ball off table and is wedged between his chair and MOTs leg

MOT reaches down to pick up the ball
MOT bounces the ball on table in front of CHI

object is not visible to camera
